sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-row justify="center">
      <v-dialog
        v-model="dialog"
        persistent
        :max-width="tamanho"
      >
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title class="text-h5">
              {{ titulo }}
          </v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
              <slot name="text"></slot>
          </v-card-text>
          <v-card-actions>
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <slot name="actions"></slot>
          </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
      </v-dialog>
    </v-row>
  </template>
  <script>
  export default {
      name: 'DialogPersistentWithoutBtnComponent',
  
      data: () => ({
          
      }),
  
      methods: {
          resposta() {
              this.$emit('response', { response: this.item, acao: this.acao})
          }
      },
  
      props: {
          titulo: String,
          dialog: Boolean,
          acao: String,
          tamanho: String,
          item: Object
      }
  }
  </script>
  <style>
      
  </style>
